element.name: output
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <output> <port id="..." type="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </port> </output>

element.name: nodeConnector
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <nodeConnector id="..." type="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeConnector>

element.name: nodeConnectorStatistics
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <nodeConnectorStatistics> <receiveOverRunError>...</receiveOverRunError> <transmitErrors>...</transmitErrors> <nodeConnector id="..." type="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeConnector> <receiveFrameError>...</receiveFrameError> <transmitPackets>...</transmitPackets> <receiveBytes>...</receiveBytes> <receiveCrcError>...</receiveCrcError> <collisionCount>...</collisionCount> <receiveDrops>...</receiveDrops> <transmitBytes>...</transmitBytes> <transmitDrops>...</transmitDrops> <receiveErrors>...</receiveErrors> <receivePackets>...</receivePackets> </nodeConnectorStatistics>

element.name: allFlowStatistics
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <allFlowStatistics> <flowStatistics> <node id="..." type="..." /> <flowStat> <flow> <priority>...</priority> <idleTimeout>...</idleTimeout> <actions /> <actions> <!--...--> </actions> <!--...more "actions" elements...--> <hardTimeout>...</hardTimeout> <id>...</id> <match> <matchField /> <matchField> <!--...--> </matchField> <!--...more "matchField" elements...--> </match> </flow> <packetCount>...</packetCount> <durationNanoseconds>...</durationNanoseconds> <byteCount>...</byteCount> <tableId>...</tableId> <durationSeconds>...</durationSeconds> </flowStat> <flowStat> <!--...--> </flowStat> <!--...more "flowStat" elements...--> </flowStatistics> <flowStatistics> <!--...--> </flowStatistics> <!--...more "flowStatistics" elements...--> </allFlowStatistics>

element.name: allPortStatistics
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <allPortStatistics> <portStatistics> <node id="..." type="..." /> <portStat> <receiveOverRunError>...</receiveOverRunError> <transmitErrors>...</transmitErrors> <nodeConnector id="..." type="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeConnector> <receiveFrameError>...</receiveFrameError> <transmitPackets>...</transmitPackets> <receiveBytes>...</receiveBytes> <receiveCrcError>...</receiveCrcError> <collisionCount>...</collisionCount> <receiveDrops>...</receiveDrops> <transmitBytes>...</transmitBytes> <transmitDrops>...</transmitDrops> <receiveErrors>...</receiveErrors> <receivePackets>...</receivePackets> </portStat> <portStat> <!--...--> </portStat> <!--...more "portStat" elements...--> </portStatistics> <portStatistics> <!--...--> </portStatistics> <!--...more "portStatistics" elements...--> </allPortStatistics>

element.name: allTableStatistics
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <allTableStatistics> <tableStatistics> <node id="..." type="..." /> <tableStat> <name>...</name> <matchedCount>...</matchedCount> <nodeTable id="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeTable> <activeCount>...</activeCount> <lookupCount>...</lookupCount> </tableStat> <tableStat> <!--...--> </tableStat> <!--...more "tableStat" elements...--> </tableStatistics> <tableStatistics> <!--...--> </tableStatistics> <!--...more "tableStatistics" elements...--> </allTableStatistics>

element.name: flowStatistics
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <flowStatistics> <node id="..." type="..." /> <flowStat> <flow> <priority>...</priority> <idleTimeout>...</idleTimeout> <actions /> <actions> <!--...--> </actions> <!--...more "actions" elements...--> <hardTimeout>...</hardTimeout> <id>...</id> <match> <matchField /> <matchField> <!--...--> </matchField> <!--...more "matchField" elements...--> </match> </flow> <packetCount>...</packetCount> <durationNanoseconds>...</durationNanoseconds> <byteCount>...</byteCount> <tableId>...</tableId> <durationSeconds>...</durationSeconds> </flowStat> <flowStat> <!--...--> </flowStat> <!--...more "flowStat" elements...--> </flowStatistics>

element.name: portStatistics
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <portStatistics> <node id="..." type="..." /> <portStat> <receiveOverRunError>...</receiveOverRunError> <transmitErrors>...</transmitErrors> <nodeConnector id="..." type="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeConnector> <receiveFrameError>...</receiveFrameError> <transmitPackets>...</transmitPackets> <receiveBytes>...</receiveBytes> <receiveCrcError>...</receiveCrcError> <collisionCount>...</collisionCount> <receiveDrops>...</receiveDrops> <transmitBytes>...</transmitBytes> <transmitDrops>...</transmitDrops> <receiveErrors>...</receiveErrors> <receivePackets>...</receivePackets> </portStat> <portStat> <!--...--> </portStat> <!--...more "portStat" elements...--> </portStatistics>

element.name: tableStatistics
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <tableStatistics> <node id="..." type="..." /> <tableStat> <name>...</name> <matchedCount>...</matchedCount> <nodeTable id="..."> <node id="..." type="..." /> </nodeTable> <activeCount>...</activeCount> <lookupCount>...</lookupCount> </tableStat> <tableStat> <!--...--> </tableStat> <!--...more "tableStat" elements...--> </tableStatistics>

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all Flow Statistics from all the Nodes.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".

outValue.documentation: List of FlowStatistics from all the Nodes

operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all the Port Statistics across all the NodeConnectors on all the Nodes.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".

outValue.documentation: List of all the Port Statistics across all the NodeConnectors on all the Nodes.

operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all the Table Statistics on all Nodes.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".

outValue.documentation: Returns a list of all the Table Statistics in a given Node.

operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of Flow Statistics for a given Node.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
Node Type as specifid by Node class

outValue.documentation: List of Flow Statistics for a given Node.

operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all the Port Statistics across all the NodeConnectors in a given Node.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
Node Type as specifid by Node class

outValue.documentation: Returns a list of all the Port Statistics across all the NodeConnectors in a given Node.

operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all the Table Statistics on all Nodes.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
Node Type as specifid by Node class

outValue.documentation: Returns a list of all the Table Statistics in a given Node.

operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

group.name: StatisticsNorthbound
group.documentation:
Northbound APIs that returns various Statistics exposed by the Southbound plugins such as Openflow.

Authentication scheme : HTTP Basic
Authentication realm : opendaylight
Transport : HTTP and HTTPS

HTTPS Authentication is disabled by default. Administrator can enable it in tomcat-server.xml after adding a proper keystore / SSL certificate from a trusted authority.
More info : http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/ssl-howto.html#Configuration
